macrovalue.element: "I don't feel like talking about that right now"
"Excuse me a moment" she says and goes off to attend to a customer
"Perhaps I'm not the best person to ask about this"
"Mhmm, maybe you should ask someone else"
"hold up one moment" she says and then serves someone, then comes back "you were saying?"
"I don't have time to answer that question right now"
